docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: After nearly 20 years of tantalizing hints that vitamins or other food substances might prevent cancer, researchers say they have finally proved that this strategy works. By giving people a form of a vitamin, they prevented one type of cancer.

headline.main: Scientists Say an Acne Drug Can Prevent a Type of Cancer

docs.snippet: LEAD: After nearly 20 years of tantalizing hints that vitamins or other food substances might prevent cancer, researchers say they have finally proved that this strategy works. By giving people a form of a vitamin, they prevented one type of cancer.
